Uses of Package
net.ffxml.swtforms.layout

Packages that use net.ffxml.swtforms.layout
net.ffxml.swtforms.builder Contains optional builder classes of SharpLayout. 
net.ffxml.swtforms.debug Consists of optional classes that help you find, understand and fix layout problems. 
net.ffxml.swtforms.factories Consists of optional Forms framework factory classes that assist you in building consistent forms quickly. 
net.ffxml.swtforms.layout Contains the core classes of SharpLayout: layout manager, column and row specifications, sizes and cell constraints. 
net.ffxml.swtforms.util Consists SharpLayout helper classes for unit conversion and layout styles. 
 

Classes in net.ffxml.swtforms.layout used by net.ffxml.swtforms.builder
Border
          Defines the border around the layout area.
CellConstraints
          Defines constraints for components that are layed out with the FormLayout.
CellConstraints.Alignment
          An ordinal-based serializable typesafe enumeration for component alignment types as used by the FormLayout.
ColumnSpec
          Specifies columns in FormLayout by their default orientation, start size and resizing behavior.
ConstantSize
          An implementation of the Size interface that represents constant sizes described by a value and unit, for example: 10 pixel, 15 point or 4 dialog units.
FormLayout
          FormLayout is a powerful, flexible and precise general purpose layout manager.
RowSpec
          Specifies rows in FormLayout by their default orientation, start size and resizing behavior.
 

Classes in net.ffxml.swtforms.layout used by net.ffxml.swtforms.debug
FormLayout
          FormLayout is a powerful, flexible and precise general purpose layout manager.
FormLayout.LayoutInfo
          Stores column and row origins.
 

Classes in net.ffxml.swtforms.layout used by net.ffxml.swtforms.factories

          Defines the border around the layout area.

          Specifies columns in FormLayout by their default orientation, start size and resizing behavior.

Classes in net.ffxml.swtforms.layout used by net.ffxml.swtforms.layout
Border
          Defines the border around the layout area.
CellConstraints
          Defines constraints for components that are layed out with the FormLayout.
CellConstraints.Alignment
          An ordinal-based serializable typesafe enumeration for component alignment types as used by the FormLayout.
ColumnSpec
          Specifies columns in FormLayout by their default orientation, start size and resizing behavior.
ConstantSize
          An implementation of the Size interface that represents constant sizes described by a value and unit, for example: 10 pixel, 15 point or 4 dialog units.
ConstantSize.Unit
          An ordinal-based serializable typesafe enumeration for units as used in instances of ConstantSize.
FormLayout
          FormLayout is a powerful, flexible and precise general purpose layout manager.
FormLayout.LayoutInfo
          Stores column and row origins.
FormSpec
          An abstract class that specifies columns and rows in FormLayout by their default alignment, start size and resizing behavior.
FormSpec.DefaultAlignment
          An ordinal-based serializable typesafe enumeration for the column and row default alignment types.
Insets
          Defines insets of a control.
RowSpec
          Specifies rows in FormLayout by their default orientation, start size and resizing behavior.
Size
          An interface that describes sizes as used by the FormLayout: component measuring sizes, constant sizes with value and unit, and bounded sizes that provide lower and upper bounds for a size.
 

Classes in net.ffxml.swtforms.layout used by net.ffxml.swtforms.util
ConstantSize
          An implementation of the Size interface that represents constant sizes described by a value and unit, for example: 10 pixel, 15 point or 4 dialog units.
Size
          An interface that describes sizes as used by the FormLayout: component measuring sizes, constant sizes with value and unit, and bounded sizes that provide lower and upper bounds for a size.
